name: Kart Draft
description:
It's a kart racing game where drafting doesn't mean what you would think.

This is a deck-building game where you and your fellow racers build the track! The Racers draft track segment cards. Pick the right cards for your kart, or pick cards you don't want the others to have.

Once the draft is done, everyone, in order, plays cards from their hand to build the track—a track build by the committee, what could go wrong.

After that, it's off to the races. Your kart is put on the track to see how it fairs. Watch and Enjoy.

This is a game built entirely for the web using the React and Redux libraries (against my better judgment : ) ). You can go through the code here https://github.com/easilyBaffled/kart-draft.
